North_Little_Rock.Turner-Ledbetter House: The Turner-Ledbetter House is a historic house at 1700 South Louisiana Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a two-story wood frame structure, its exterior mostly finished in brick, with a hip roof and a variety of dormers, projections, porches, and decorative elements typical of the Queen Anne period of architecture. Notable features include a three-story turret with flared conical roof, and entry porch with turned posts, bracketing, and a spindled balustrade, and windows with stone sills.
